attributes.comment: Thank you for the opportunity to comment on the referenced Request for Information (RFI). The HL7 FHIR at Scale Taskforce (FAST) and its membership appreciate the recognition and consideration of the work we have done to date, specifically related to our work on the HL7 FHIR FAST National Healthcare Directory implementation guide (IG). FAST looks forward to the opportunity to work closely with CMS to further discuss the details of the initial use cases that can be supported by a FHIR-based National Directory of Healthcare Providers & Services (NDH) solution. We also would be happy to support bringing together industry leaders who could share their lessons learned related to directory development and maintenance, and the critical work needed to ensure data accuracy and data quality and management. We have a great deal of experience and history working on this topic, and have extensive learnings and community insights we can bring forward to help CMS phase in a truly valuable, actionable, and trusted NDH.
